column2: Buy a slugger? Need to knock it out of the park?  Want to make a grand slam? Or do you just need to keep it around for uninvited guests?  Be a player, don't sit on the bench!
I'll take one wooden bat.
I'd like a metal bat.
I don't care for sports, I want a fire axe.
I don't want an improvised weapon.
When the Government tries to take your guns, make sure you have more guns. Paid for by Herculean Firearms PAC
A revolver is classic. Go ahead, make my day.
Feelin' lucky, punk? A large caliber monster, the Colt Anaconda!
Revolvers are obsolete. I want more ammo.
The government can't take your guns, if you don't have any guns.
A wise man always has a gun in his house, for hunting purposes of course. Paid for by Herculean Firearms PAC
Hunting bucks!
Hunting birds!
Hunting vampires!
Hunting nothing!
Sometimes, a man has to join a militia in the woods and make sure they're well armed. Paid for by Herculean Firearms PAC
Dakka dakka dakka!
The Holy Land Special!
You can't take away my Assault Rifle!
Wait, you want me to shit in the woods?
Sometimes, military grade hardware falls off the back of a truck, and REAL men take advantage of it. Paid for by Herculean Firearms PAC
They think they can outsmart me, but can they outsmart bullet?
Look dad, I'm a sniper not a gunman... Well one's an occupation innit?
What about like a shotgun but with a magazine!?!
I'd rather just buy hats.

Sailfish from Endron Motors: The most luxurious sportscar on the market, accepts only the finest gasoline. Now availible in the new XLR8 package with super-hyper-turbocharged engine. Get started with a low down payment tonight!
I feel the need... The need for speed!
Ya know... There's a police auction going on right now too...
I think I need a car that's a bit beefier than that.
I don't need any new wheels.
You know you're in the lap of absolute luxury when you are thinking about buying a limo.
A standard limo would suit someone of my means.
People are out to get me, I should armor the limo.
Control, This agent requires only the best.
I wouldn't waste money on that!
Motorsteed from Endron Motors: Power. Speed. Noise. Freedom. Motorsteed.
I want it!
I prefer the Ninja-To from Endron-of-Japan.
Endron creeps me out... Maybe a Nativist instead?
No bikes!
Motorsteed Gold edition: With real gold mined from the darkest jungles of Africa. Endron Motors presents the motorcycle for the sophisticated driver.
I deserve gold.
If I'm gonna spend that kinda money I want it to be Powerful.
Racing bikes, speed-speed-speed.
No bikes!
This-Coast Custom motorcycles: For a ride that screams You"!
Build me a bike.
Why build one from scratch when I can afford a Braggatti?
Call me old fashioned, but I'd really like a real horse.
No bikes!
Conquistador from Endron Motors: Twelve yards long, two lanes wide, sixty-five tons of American pride, Conquistador!
That theme song is gonna be stuck in my head now...
Woah! That's way too big. A nice reliable Euro-car for me.
Both those options are kinda gas guzzlers...
I like my bus-pass.
Nastrum Enterprises: Your source for surplus military-grade vehicles. Just don't tell the gub'ment!
I think god wants me to have my own private transport jet.
Nothing says class like a helicopter.
You take the high road and I'll take the low road.
Are you high?
When the chips are down and your enemies have guns, who do you trust to stop a bullet? Body-armor by AEZIR.
You know, my power-suit could use a Kevlar weave for that extra boost of confidence.
Maybe I could use something more convenient.
Maybe I could just make friends with my enemies?
Only the best for our men and women in uniform. Body-armor by AEZIR.
Protect my vitals!
Protect my everything!
Isn't this a bit excessive?
Herrick's Department Store presents: The latest line of imported blades from the far east, for all your culinary and self-defense needs.
Oh hey that one looks like the Slicemaster from that one Samurai movie from last year!
Culinary needs? This one could slice a side of beef in half!
I heard a rumor that a master smith was in town... maybe he could make a better blade than all of these.
I'm good, thanks.
